thread.title: Former Hawaii State Worker Says He Thought Missile Attack Was Real

author: wsjcom
title: Former Hawaii State Worker Says He Thought Missile Attack Was Real
text:
HONOLULU—A former Hawaii state worker who sent a false missile alert last month said Friday that he was devastated for causing panic but was “100 percent sure” at the time that the attack was real.
The man in his 50s spoke to reporters on the condition that he not be identified because he fears for his safety after receiving threats.
He said...
